name: image-paste
description: Paste image data from clipboard into text-editor as new file

assetsDir.title: Assets directory
assetsDir.description: Local directory to copy images to. Dir will be created if not found. This will only work if you paste the image into a text editor.

forwardSlash.title: Force forward slash
forwardSlash.description: Replace all backslashes that occur in the default path with forward slashes. Manually inserted backslashes are not replaced.

pasteHack.title: Hack paste methods
pasteHack.description: The paste methods `core:paste` & `tree-view:paste` are hacked to capture the images.

imagePreview.title: Image preview
imagePreview.description: Show image preview in dialog window.
